alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 7:25PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. On Monday, northwest wind gusts of 45 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. On Monday, areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
